alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera; Northern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:50PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pondera County through 615 PM MDT... At 549 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Valier, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Valier. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 344 and 348. Highway 89 between mile markers 71 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for north central Montana.
